response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at a special price tailored for you. Considering its extraordinary quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $1,200,000. This offer not only ensures you secure an asset of great worth but also allows you to benefit from a significant discount compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 1200000}
